Text:
My software version is 6.1, should I even bother downloading these games? Like I've been trying to download Ratchet and clank: size matters, and it hasn't been working at all... 
I looked it up and apparently it has to do with my software version.. any ideas?
Jeez... Yor software isn't able to run cracked games. install CFW (Custom Firmware). Read on some internet pages, even google will help. but you need to know exact model of your console.
